ticket.title: After installing Rails 3, unable to create apps with older versions
ticket.original-body:
I have installed rails 3 onto my ruby 1.8.7 installation. I have rails 2.3.5, 2.3.4 installed there as well. I get the following error when I tried to create a app with 2.3.5
rishav@rishav-laptop:~/rails_apps$ rails _2.3.5_ todo_list -d mysql /usr/local/lib/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems.rb:827:in `report_activate_error': RubyGem version error: railties(3.0.pre not = 2.3.5) (Gem::LoadError) from /usr/local/lib/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems.rb:261:in `activate' from /usr/local/lib/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems.rb:68:in `gem' from /usr/bin/rails:1
ticket.latest-body:
I have installed rails 3 onto my ruby 1.8.7 installation. I have rails 2.3.5, 2.3.4 installed there as well. I get the following error when I tried to create a app with 2.3.5
rishav@rishav-laptop:~/rails_apps$ rails _2.3.5_ todo_list -d mysql /usr/local/lib/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems.rb:827:in `report_activate_error': RubyGem version error: railties(3.0.pre not = 2.3.5) (Gem::LoadError) from /usr/local/lib/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems.rb:261:in `activate' from /usr/local/lib/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems.rb:68:in `gem' from /usr/bin/rails:1

I have installed rails 3 onto my ruby 1.8.7 installation. I have rails 2.3.5, 2.3.4 installed there as well. I get the following error when I tried to create a app with 2.3.5

rishav@rishav-laptop:~/rails_apps$ rails 2.3.5 todo_list -d mysql
/usr/local/lib/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems.rb:827:in report_activate_error': RubyGem version error: railties(3.0.pre not = 2.3.5) (Gem::LoadError)

from /usr/local/lib/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems.rb:261:in `activate'
from /usr/local/lib/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems.rb:68:in `gem'
from /usr/bin/rails:1

version.title: After installing Rails 3, unable to create apps with older versions

version.body: I'm having the same problem. Were you able to find a solution? I tried "rails _2.3.5_ code" too.
version.body-html: I'm having the same problem. Were you able to find a solution? I tried "rails 2.3.5 code" too.
version.title: After installing Rails 3, unable to create apps with older versions

version.body: Unfortunately won't fix. It's more like a Rubygems limitation.
version.body-html: Unfortunately won't fix. It's more like a Rubygems limitation.
